name: 凌凱
objective: 本課程使學生具有進階德語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
schedule:
September 19: Partner interviews, introducing each other
September 26: We are all super stars at a party (game), conjugating verbs
October 3: Lesson 3 - Food and drinks
October 17: Lesson 3 - Plural forms, working with a dictionary, at the market
October 24: Lesson 3 - Asking for prices, special offers, measure words
October 31: Lesson 3 - In a restaurant, my favorite things
November 7: Lesson 3 - Dictation, review, test
November 14: Lesson 4 - My apartment
November 21: Lesson 4 - Comparing houses
November 28: Lesson 4 - Furniture, electric devices
December 5: Lesson 4 - Colors, numbers, renting an apartment
December 12: Lesson 4 - Reading and listening exercises, review, test
December 19: Lesson 5 - My day
December 26: Lesson 5 - Giving the time, activities at home
January 2: Lesson 5 - My schedule from Monday to Friday, review
January 9: Final exam
scorePolicy:
Class participation: 10%
Assignments: 20%
Quizzes: 10%
Midterm exam: 30%
Final exam: 30%
materials: As a textbook we use "Schritte International 1". It is a good choice for teaching German because of its systematic training of the four different skills: reading, listening, speaking, and writing. Included are a workbook (used for doing exercises at home) and three audio CDs.
